You can increase the level of the clan. To do this, you need the following:
1st level - [SP: 1,000, Adena: 100]
2nd level - [SP: 1,500, Adena: 200]
3rt level - [SP: 3,000, Seal of Power, Adena: 300, CRP: 1000]
4th level - [SP: 4,000, Seal of Glory, Adena: 1000, CRP: 5000]
5th level - [SP: 5,000, Seal of Honor, Adena: 5000, CRP: 15000]
